#summary About zip compressed theme

= Zip compressed theme =

Make a theme zip file (which is a normal "zip" file) containing various xml, png, jpg files that are named by rules described by this document. You can use that zip file as a !NemusLauncher theme.

== Theme-able items ==

 * application icons
 * workspace wallpaper image
 * all apps list background image
 * all apps button background & foreground images
 * pagemarker images 

<br><br>
== Zip file location ==

Your theme zip file should be located as following

<br>
<pre>
SDCARD_ROOT/nemuslauncher/themes/MY_BEAUTIFUL_THEME_NAME.zip
or
/mnt/sdcard/nemuslauncher/themes/My_fantastic_theme.zip
</pre>
<br>

The exact file name can be *WHATEVER* you want, but must be ended with "*.zip*".

<br><br>
== Zip file structure ==

Theme zip file should contain following files or/and sub folders.

 * `info.xml` file
 * `preview.png` or `preview.jpg` file
 * `drawable` folder
 * `icon` folder

*info.xml file is mandatory* and the others are all optional. You can safely omit optional files or folders if you don't want to customize those UI elements with your theme.

----

=== info.xml ===

Mandatory file that specifies *theme name* and *target dpi*.

Following is an info.xml excerption from a theme which is named "_!BlackAndWhite_" and has _240_ target dpi.
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<info>

<!-- Representative name that appears in the installed theme list -->
<name>BlackAndWhite</name>

<!-- target density : 120, 160, 240, 320
120 : low density :
160 : medium density : hTC G1 ...
240 : high density : Google NexusOne, Google NexusS, Samsung Galaxy S2, Motorola Droid ...
320 : ultra high density : Google GalaxyNexus ...
-->
<density>240</density>

</info>
}}}

!NemusLauncher will not allow to apply your theme if it's target dpi doesn't match your current device's dpi.

----
=== preview.png or preview.jpg===

You're encouraged to include *preview.png* or *preview.jpg* because it is representative icon when you select a theme from all the installed theme list. preview file itself is not actual theme GUI component.
 


----
=== drawable folder ===
*drawable* folder contains predefined GUI resources. The lists are as following.

||file name||preview||default GUI image||note||
||`wallpaper.png (or .jpg)`|| || || ||
||`allapps_bg.png (or .jpg)`|| || || ||
||`all_apps_button_bg_normal.png`|| || || ||
||`all_apps_button_bg_press.png`|| || || ||
||`all_apps_button_normal.png`|| || || ||
||`applist_home_button.png`|| || || ||
||`pagemarker.png`|| || || ||
||`pagemarker_bg.png`|| || || ||
||`pagemarker_more.png`|| || || ||



----
=== icon folder ===
*icon* folder contains new themed icons for installed applications. You can make mappings from your new theme icons to the installed applications with the file naming rule that is described here.

<br>
<pre>
Icon file naming rule
1. Icon image must be a "*.png*" image file
2. Icon file name must come from the java class name of matching application 
  with all the period character replaced by underscore character
  and all lowercased.
3. For common factory installed applications, simplified short name can be used.
</pre>


<br><br>
For the Rule 2, here you have some examples.
||Application||Application class name||Theme icon file name||
||Market||`com.android.vending.assetbrowseractivity`||`com_android_vending_assetbrowseractivity.png`||
||Facebook||`com.facebook.katana.loginactivity`||`com_facebook_katana_loginactivity.png`||
||!NemusCamera||`com.nemustech.ncam.MainActivity`||`com_nemustech_ncam_mainactivity.png`||

Rule 2 happens to be the same as the naming rule of the ADW Launcher theme. You might want to reference the 
[http://adwlauncher.wikia.com/wiki/Theme_Icon_Name_Database#System_Apps ADW theme icon name database].

<br><br>
For the Rule 3, you can use predefined short name list as following.
||Application||Short theme icon file name||
||Browser||`_browser.png`||
||Calendar||`_calendar.png`||
||Camera||`_camera.png`||
||Contact||`_contact.png`||
||EMail||`_email.png`||
||Gallery||`_gallery.png`||
||Messsage||`_mms.png`||
||Music||`_music.png`||
||Phone||`_phone.png`||
||Setting||`_setting.png`||
